message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
Let's be more equitable.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, recognizing the value of my contribution.
Let's try to find a middle ground. I'll take 70% and you can have 30%.
Let's split it evenly.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money, and it avoids further risk of losing value from inflation.
